p: The plant materials were dried in an oven at 35Â°C for 48 h. Powdered leaves of L.S (300 g), P.F (530 g), O.F (685 g), and P.B (430 g) were successively extracted with hexane, then dichloromethane, ethyl acetate, and finally ethanol in a percolator, at room temperature after which they were concentrated in a vacuum to give the corresponding extracts.
